Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: The c.248G>A variant resulted in complete loss of interaction with known binding partners, assessed by decreased signal during co-immunoprecipitation.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent experiments were performed and assessed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Clear band signal for interaction with known binding partners.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Absence of band signal for interaction with known binding partners.
